item.description:
This month we've visiting the home of new member Kiya Smith in Portland. Come learn more and share ideas and a potluck meal with the group. In addition to being an experienced gardener, Kiya is also a mushroom aficionado. October might be a good time to see her mushroom growing efforts!

Open to all experience levels.

House meetings typically go like this:

  • Meet at 6:00 and start a tour of our member's home while we have daylight (try to arrive by or before 6:00 if you can so you don't miss anything our host has to tell us or miss questions from other members...)
  • During the tour we hear about site "assets" and "challenges" and ask questions
  • About 6:45 or so we have a potluck supper, general conversation and then a bit of an agenda such as..
  • Roundtable - introductions and thoughts about the property we viewed
  • A summary of our best ideas for the member to use as they see fit
  • A few house keeping items, like upcoming events, etc.

    Break up around 8:30.


    Please see our Meetup Event RSVP Guidelines:
    http://permaculture.m...

    If this event is full and you would like to get on the waiting list for an open spot, RSVP "no" with a comment that you'd like to get in...

    Please remember to bring your own potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin)!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: October Permaculture Meetup
